title: 求助，请大神帮我检查一下
author: Enerman

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: 请将指令修改为/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:5,buy:{id:emerald_block,Count:2},sell:{id:diamond_sword,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:10}]}}}]}}复制代码没有加id并且ench的括号为[]

replies.author: Enerman
replies.txt_content: 谢谢，不过请问怎么给村民改名字

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
End-Enderman 发表于 2015-5-24 16:02
请将指令修改为 没有加id并且ench的括号为[]
他问你怎么改名字

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content:
Enerman 发表于 2015-5-24 16:07
谢谢，不过请问怎么给村民改名字
加上CustomName:xxx

replies.author: Enerman
replies.txt_content:
End-Enderman 发表于 2015-5-24 16:14
加上CustomName:xxx
加在哪里

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content:
Enerman 发表于 2015-5-24 16:14
加在哪里
括号里，Offers旁边。比如/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:黑商,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:5,buy:{id:emerald_block,Count:2},sell:{id:diamond_sword,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:10}]}}}]}}复制代码
